quotes: Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit.
Lord, open my lips, and my mouth shall declare your praise.
Blessed be the Most Holy Trinity now and forever.
O Most Holy Trinity, have mercy on us.
Holy, Holy, Holy Lord God of hosts.
Vultum tuum, Domine, requiram (Ps 26, 8)!
Psalm 67:2: Let God arise, and let his enemies be scattered: and let them that hate him flee from before his face!
Glory be to you, O Trinity, equal in majesty, one single Godhead, before all ages, now and forever!
The Catholic faith consists in adoring one God in three Persons and three Persons in one God!
May the most just and most lovable Will of God be done, fulfilled, praised, and eternally glorified above all things. So be it. So be it!
Let us always remain in thanksgiving!
Christ is risen from the dead, by his death he has trampled on death, and to those in the tombs he has granted life!
Psalm 118:14: The Lord is my strength and my praise: and he is become my salvation.
You descended to the tomb, O Immortal One, and yet you destroyed the power of hell.
Psalm 117:24: This is the day which the Lord hath made: let us be glad and rejoice therein!
Psalm 16:11: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life, thou shalt fill me with joy with thy countenance: at thy right hand are delights even to the end.
Let us adore and prostrate ourselves before Christ, who is risen from the dead, our eternal God and Savior!
Psalm 150:6: Let everything that breathes, praise the Lord!
We praise you, O God; we acknowledge you as Lord.
Psalm 8:2: O Lord, our Lord, how admirable is thy name in the whole earth!
Blessed be the Most Holy Trinity, now and forever.
O God, come to my assistance; O Lord, make haste to help me.
Come, Holy Spirit, fill the hearts of Thy faithful and enkindle in them the fire of Thy love!
Come, O Holy Spirit! Enlighten my mind to know your precepts!
(Holy Spirit) Strengthen my heart against the snares of the enemy, inflame my will!
(Holy Spirit) I hear your voice and do not wish to harden my heart or resist, saying: later... tomorrow. Nunc coepi! Now!, so that tomorrow does not take too long to find!
O Spirit of truth and wisdom, Spirit of understanding and counsel, Spirit of joy and peace! I want what You want, I want because You want, I want as You want, I want when You want!
Do whatever pleases your eyes!
Lord, I surrender myself to You, I trust in You, I rest in You!
O my God, every day I feel less secure in myself and more secure in You!
Lord, my God! Into your hands I abandon the past, the present, and the future, the small and the great, the little and the much, the temporal and the eternal!
To You, O God, we give glory! To You, Lord, we give thanks!
To You, Eternal Father, all creation bows in reverence!
Holy, Holy, Holy is the Lord, God of Hosts!
The heavens and the earth are filled with the majesty of Your Glory!
To You sings the glorious choir of the Apostles, the admirable multitude of the Prophets, white-robed army of Martyrs!
Save your people, O Lord, and bless your inheritance!
In You, Lord, we place our trust forever!
Abba, Father!
Grant them eternal rest, O Lord, and may perpetual light shine upon them.
Requiem aeternum dona eis, Domine!
May the souls of the faithful departed, through the mercy of God, rest in peace.
Grant them eternal rest, Lord, and may perpetual light shine upon them.
Jesus, remember me when you come into your kingdom.
O God, Creator and Redeemer of all the faithful, grant the souls of your servants the remission of all their sins.
May the angels lead you to paradise; may the martyrs welcome you upon your arrival.
Merciful Father, lead the souls in Purgatory from the prison of darkness to the wonderful light of Heaven!
God Holy Spirit, I thank you for all the blessings with which you have sanctified the souls in Purgatory!
Dear souls in Purgatory: I ask you for the most important of all your graces: final perseverance and a holy death!
Dear souls in Purgatory: I ask you to let me die like the holy Patriarchs, leaving this valley of tears without sadness!
Dear souls in Purgatory: I ask you to let me die like the glorious Saint Joseph, accompanied by Jesus and Mary, pronouncing these names for all eternity!
Dear souls in Purgatory: I ask you to let me die like the Immaculate Virgin, in the purest charity and with the desire to unite myself with the only object of my love!
Dear souls in Purgatory: I ask you to let me die like Jesus on the Cross, fully identified with the Father's Will, offered as a sacrifice of love!
Lord, have mercy on the souls in purgatory.
O Lord, hear my prayer, and let my cry come unto you.
May divine assistance always be with us, and may the souls of the faithful departed rest in peace.
Merciful Jesus, grant them eternal rest.
All Saints of God, pray for us!
Psalm 84:11: For a sun and shield is the LORD God, bestowing all grace and glory
Psalm 23:6: And thy mercy will follow me all the days of my life. And that I may dwell in the house of the Lord unto length of days.
O Mary, Mother of God, come to their aid with your powerful intercession.
Absolve, O Lord, the souls of your servants!
Psalm 130:1-2: A gradual canticle. Out of the depths I have cried to thee, O Lord: Lord, hear my voice.
O Father, be merciful to the souls you have called from this world!
My Jesus, by your side pierced by the lance, from which flowed blood and water, have mercy on the souls in Purgatory!
Dear souls in Purgatory, grant me the grace to die in an act of perfect charity toward God!
Angel of God, my guardian dear, To whom God's love commits me here, Ever this day, be at my side, To light and guard, Rule and guide. Amen.
Holy Archangels, Michael, Gabriel, and Raphael, pray for us.
All holy angels and archangels, pray for us.
Non vos me elegistis, sed Ego elegi vos, et posui vos, ut eatis et fructum aferatis, et fructus vester maneat!
Saint Michael the Archangel, defend us in battle.
Psalm 103:19-20: The lord hath prepared his throne in heaven: and his kingdom shall rule over all. Bless the Lord, all ye his angels.
Psalm 91:11: For he hath given his angels charge over thee; to keep thee in all thy ways
My guardian angel, cover me with your shield against the snares and traps of the devil!
Holy Guardian Angel, sweet companion, do not abandon me, neither by night nor by day!
Holy Guardian Angel, treasure of the Lord, who was sent from Heaven to be my guardian!
I beg you, blessed angel, to free me and protect me from the snares of the accursed one, now and forever. Amen!
Holy Guardian Angel, although you are invisible, I know you walk beside me!
Holy Guardian Angel, although you are invisible, I know that you hear my prayers and watch over my steps!
Holy Angel of the Lord, may I hear your message and follow it!
My Guardian Angel, my friend from Heaven, thank you for your faithful protection, thank you for your company!
Sancte Michaele Archangele, defende nos in proelio!
Quis sicut Deus, Domine!
Psalm 103:20: Bless the Lord, all ye his angels: you that are mighty in strength, and execute his word, hearkening to the voice of his orders.
O holy angels, watch over us at all times during this dangerous life.
May your holy angel be with me, so that the evil enemy may have no power over me.
May the holy angels keep us in peace.
O God, send your holy angels to watch over us.
Holy Guardian Angel, guide us on the path to salvation.
O angels of God, our dear guardians, to whom God's love entrusts us here.
Saint Gabriel, obtain for us the grace of a living faith.
By the intercession of St. Michael and the celestial Choir of Seraphim may the Lord make us worthy to burn with the fire of perfect charity!
By the intercession of St. Gabriel and the celestial Choir of Cherubim may the Lord grant us the grace to leave the ways of sin and run in the paths of Christian perfection!
By the intercession of St. Raphael and the celestial Choir of Thrones may the Lord infuse into our hearts a true and sincere spirit of humility!
By the intercession of St. Michael and the celestial Choir of Dominations may the Lord give us grace to govern our senses and overcome any unruly passions!
By the intercession of St. Gabriel and the celestial Choir of Powers may the Lord protect our souls against the snares and temptations of the devil!
By the intercession of St. Raphael and the celestial Choir of Virtues may the Lord preserve us from evil and falling into temptation!
Holy Thrones, Angels of Life, pray for us!
Holy Angels of Adoration, pray for us!
Holy Dominations, pray for us!
Holy Powers, pray for us!
Holy Heavenly Principalities, pray for us!
Holy Virtues, pray for us!
Defenders of God's children, pray for us!
Saint Joseph, foster father of Jesus, pray for us.
O Saint Joseph, whose protection is so great, so strong, so immediate before the throne of God.
Saint Joseph, model of all who are devoted to work, obtain for me the grace to work with a spirit of penance.
Guardian of the Incarnate Word, I feel confident that your prayers on my behalf will be graciously heard before the throne of God.
Saint Joseph, terror of demons, protect us.
O blessed Saint Joseph, father of tender heart, faithful guardian of Jesus.
Saint Joseph, consoler of the afflicted, have mercy on me.
Saint Joseph, hope of the sick, pray for us.
Saint Joseph, patron of the dying, pray for me.
Saint Joseph, chaste guardian of the Virgin, protect us.
Saint Joseph, diligent protector of Christ, pray for us.
Saint Joseph, head of the Holy Family, pray for us.
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to work with a spirit of penance!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to put my duty above my natural inclinations!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to work with gratitude and joy!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to offer the talents received from God!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to work with order!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to work with perseverance!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to work with intensity!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to work in the presence of God!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to work with purity of intention!
Saint Joseph, obtain for me the grace to work thinking incessantly of souls!
Saint Joseph, be my guardian of purity!
Illustrious offspring of David, pray for us!
Light of patriarchs, pray for us!
Spouse of the Mother of God, pray for us!
Purest guardian of the Virgin, pray for us!
Foster father of the Son of God, pray for us!
Zealous defender of Christ, pray for us!
Head of the Holy Family, pray for us!
Mirror of patience, pray for us!
Model of workers, pray for us!
Glory of domestic life, pray for us!
Protector of the Holy Church, pray for us!
My dear Saint Joseph: purify all my sensuality so that I may not seek compensation of any kind!
My dear Saint Joseph: humble my pride so that I may not seek to exalt myself!
My dear Saint Joseph: refine my readiness to serve Jesus alone!
O Most Holy Sacrament, O Divine Sacrament, all praise and all thanksgiving be given at every moment.
Adoro te devote latens Deitas!
Jesus, I trust in You.
Lord, I am not worthy that you should enter under my roof, but only say the word and I shall be healed.
May the heart of Jesus in the Most Blessed Sacrament be praised, adored, and loved with grateful affection at every moment.
Jesus, meek and humble of heart, make my heart like yours.
Sweetest Jesus, most holy Body and Blood, be the delight and pleasure of my soul.
O Jesus, in the Most Blessed Sacrament, have mercy on us.
May the Most Blessed Sacrament be praised and adored forever.
Jesus, Lamb of God, who take away the sins of the world, have mercy on us.
O Lord, strengthen my faith in the Sacrament of Your Body and Blood.
Jesus, Bread of Life, nourish my soul.
Psalm 23:5: You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies; you anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows.
Psalm 34:8: Oh, taste and see that the Lord is good; blessed is the man who takes refuge in him.
Psalm 116:12-13: What shall I render to the Lord for all his benefits to me? I will lift up the cup of salvation and call on the name of the Lord.
Receive me today, O Son of God, as a partaker of Your Mystic Supper.
Psalm 84:1-2: How lovely is your dwelling place, O Lord of hosts! My soul longs, yes, faints for the courts of the Lord.
Let my prayer rise before You like incense, and the lifting of my hands like the evening sacrifice.
Lord, you know everything, you know that I love you.
Grant me, Lord, the love with which You wish me to love You!
Let us lay aside all earthly cares, that we may receive the King of all, invisibly escorted by angelic hosts.
Jesus, meek and humble of heart, make my heart like Yours!
Lord Jesus: be our Shepherd and lead us eternally!
Most Sacred and Merciful Heart of Jesus, grant us peace!
For I will not speak of Your Mystery to Your enemies, nor will I give You a kiss like Judas; but like the thief I will confess You: Remember me, Lord, in Your Kingdom.
Psalm 1:1-2: Blessed is the man who walks not in the counsel of the wicked, but whose delight is in the law of the Lord!
Lord, I want to be by Your side like a little donkey!
We are unworthy servants; we have only done what was our duty!
He must increase, and I must decrease!
Hidden Mystery, we adore You!
Sacrament that nourishes us, we adore You!
Sacrifice that redeems us, we adore You!
Admirable Mystery, we adore You!
Delightful Sacrament, we adore You!
Ineffable Sacrifice, we adore You!
Impenetrable Mystery, we adore You!
Sacrament that hides God Himself, we adore You!
We adore You, O Christ, and we bless You, because by Your holy cross You have redeemed the world.
O my Jesus, pardon and mercy for the merits of Your holy wounds.
Lord Jesus, crucified, have mercy on us.
Psalm 68:1: May God arise, may his enemies be scattered; may those who hate him flee from his presence!
O Jesus, through the merits of Your Holy Cross, grant me the grace of perseverance.
By Your holy cross, O Jesus, You have redeemed the world.
O Jesus, who for love of me bore the weight of the cross, teach me to bear my daily crosses with patience.
Jesus, Son of the living God, have mercy on me, a sinner.
My Jesus, I love You above all things.
Jesus, I trust in You.
Into Your hands, Lord, I commit my spirit.
O Jesus, strengthen me in moments of suffering.
Lord, remember me when You come into Your kingdom.
Lord, if You wish, You can make me clean!
You will not despise, Lord, a contrite and humbled heart!
Deign, O Lord, to keep us from sin this day!
Have mercy on us, Lord, have mercy on us!
May Your mercy, Lord, come upon us!
My God! May I hate sin and unite myself to You!
Have mercy on me, Lord, according to Your goodness!
According to the greatness of Your mercy, Lord, blot out my iniquity!
Lord, wash me thoroughly from my guilt and cleanse me from my sin!
We adore You, O Christ, and we bless You, because by Your Holy Cross, You have redeemed the world.
By His wounds, we are healed.
I acknowledge my iniquity, Lord, my sin is always before me!
Against You, You only, have I sinned and done what is evil in Your sight!
Behold, I was born in guilt, Lord, my mother conceived me in sin!
Instill in me, Lord, true wisdom in the depths of my soul!
Sprinkle me, Lord, with a branch of hyssop and I shall be clean!
Wash me, my good Jesus, and I shall be whiter than snow!
Make me hear, Lord, words of joy and gladness, that the bones You have crushed may rejoice!
Turn Your eyes away from my sins, and blot out all my guilt!
O my God, create in me a pure heart, and renew a steadfast spirit within me!
Do not cast me away from Your presence, and do not take Your Holy Spirit from me!
Restore to me the joy of Your salvation, and sustain me with a generous spirit!
Stabat Mater Dolorosa, iuxta Crucem lacrimosa, dum pendebat Filius.
Hail Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with you.
O Mary, conceived without sin, pray for us who have recourse to you.
Mother of God, pray for us sinners now and at the hour of our death.
Holy Mary, Mother of God, intercede for us with your Son.
Remember, O most gracious Virgin Mary, that never was it known that anyone who fled to your protection was left unaided by you.
Queen of Heaven, rejoice! Alleluia!
O Mary, my Mother, I consecrate myself entirely to you.
Sweet Heart of Mary, be my salvation.
O Mary, Mother of the Church, guide us to your Son.
Our Lady of Sorrows, obtain for us true contrition for our sins.
Psalm 92:5: Your decrees, Lord, stand firm; holiness adorns your house for endless days.
O Mary, refuge of sinners, lead us to Jesus.
Immaculate Heart of Mary, be our refuge and our salvation.
Psalm 71:6: From my mother's womb, You have been my strength, O Lord.
Holy Mary, our hope, Seat of Wisdom, pray for us!
Holy Mary, our hope, Handmaid of the Lord, pray for us!
Under your protection we seek refuge, Holy Mother of God; do not despise the petitions we address to you in our necessities!
If you stumble on the obstacles of temptation, look to the star, invoke Mary!
If the waves of pride rise against you, look to the star, invoke Mary!
If the waves of envy grow stronger, look to the star, invoke Mary!
If impurity violently shakes the boat of your soul, look to the star, invoke Mary!
If disturbed by the memory of your sins, you begin to sink into the abyss of sorrow or the abyss of despair, think of Mary!
Sancta Maria, Mater Dei, ora pro nobis!
Sancta Maria, Mater Ecclesiae, ora pro nobis!
Sancta Maria, Mater Divinae Gratiae, ora pro nobis!
Sancta Maria, Mater Purissima, ora pro nobis!
Sancta Maria, Causa Nostrae Laetitiae, ora pro nobis!
Sancta Maria, Virgo Fidelis, ora pro nobis!
Sancta Maria, Auxilium Christianorum, ora pro nobis!
Sancta Maria, Regina Familae, ora pro nobis!
